text:
Looking back now, I think I had gotten
into the habit of living with my head down.

I didn't want to see the happy people,
I didn't want to know the looks they would give at my miserable self.
...I just kept my head down and let it pass by.

name: Roudin
text:
...To all of you, our audience.
Welcome to Roudin's Magic Show,
and please enjoy it until the very end.

Back when I had just debuted,
I was praised as a genius,
and the seats were always full.

But, around the time I became an adult,
my popularity gradually declined.
And before I knew it—

It had become the norm for me to flash
my empty smile to an almost-empty audience.

'Come to think of it, I haven't heard
the name Roudin much lately. I used to watch
his streams a lot back in the day.'

'Roudin?
Who's that, never heard of him.'

'He was called a genius
child magician a while back.'

'Hmm.
What's he doing now?
A genius adult magician?'

'Who knows?
I haven't heard his name lately,
maybe he retired?'

'Don't care.
More importantly, yesterday's stream!
It was super hype, wasn't it!?'

'Totally!
There's been a rush of new debuts lately,
and the content's insane!!'

name: Roudin
text:
...Haha.
I, what the hell am I doing?
This just makes me feel miserable.

Little by little, on the Internet,
and from people's memories,
my name is disappearing.

And yet, I believed that the existence
known as Roudin could make people smile.
That I had a place to belong to.

Just to feel that tiny bit of reality,
I searched for my name every day, and used it as support
to walk through another day— Or so I thought.

name: Roudin
text:
...What do you mean,
the next stage will be the last one!?
We just had a meeting about the show, didn't we!?

name: Manager
text:
...Sorry, Roudin.
They said a promising newcomer has joined,
so they want to give the stage to them...

name: Roudin
text:
...W-Wait a minute.
I've been performing on that stage
ever since I debuted!?

name: Roudin
text:
Even after the last performance!
They said it was a good show,
and they'd see me next time!!

name: Manager
text:
.........
...I apologize.

name: Roudin
text:
...Can't you do something about it?
If I perform magic in front of the owner
directly, and he acknowledges me...!!

name: Roudin
text:
Hey, please... Please...!!
If that stage is gone,
my magic career is...!!

name: Manager
text:
...Roudin, about that.
Why don't you take a break
from magic for a while?

name: Manager
text:
I know magic is everything to you.
But, I feel like that's also
what's holding you back.

name: Manager
text:
Lately, you've been forcing yourself to try
high-difficulty magic tricks, right?
And you've been making more mistakes on stage.

name: Roudin
text:
...!!
T-That's...

name: Manager
text:
Even if you can't be a hero, you're still
a member of us NeoTalent Productions.
As long as you're here—

name: Manager
text:
We'll spare no support to help you
polish yourself as a talent and shine.
In fact, we've done a lot of things for you, haven't we?

name: Manager
text:
Your singing and dancing have improved a lot, right?
Your idol route is... Well,
since you didn't like it, I won't mention it again.

name: Manager
text:
As long as you're in this industry, something
might trigger another break for you.
You can sell your magic again then.

name: Roudin
text:
...Yeah, maybe.
Thanks, I'll think about it.
For now, I'll focus on the last stage.

name: Roudin
text:
...To all of you, our audience.
Welcome to Roudin's Magic Show.
Today will be my last stage—

name: Roudin
text:
Until the very last moment,
on a stage that brings smiles
to the world, please enjoy...!

name: Roudin
text:
(Maybe because it's my last stage,
that there are quite a few people here today.)

name: Roudin
text:
(Even if it's just a little,
if I can make these people smile,
I'll keep doing magic, and someday...)

name: Audience
text: Who, is that?

name: Audience
text:
Huh?
You're the one who said
you wanted to see him.

name: Audience
text:
What are you talking about?
This isn't the person I wanted to see.
I told you it was the promising newcomer, didn't I?

name: Audience
text:
No, I definitely... Oh, sorry!
His stage starts tomorrow.
No wonder the tickets were so easy to get.

name: Audience
text:
Eh...?
What should we do,
wanna leave?

name: Audience
text:
Since we're here, let's watch.
It might be fun.

name: Audience
text:
Hmm...
Well, I don't have any other plans, so I guess.
It might be good practice for tomorrow!

name: Roudin
text:
...Please.
Enjoy... until the end.

The voices from a corner of the
audience sounded terribly loud.

At that time, I wonder if I was even able to smile.
Did I stand on that stage,
as a magician, until the very end?

Well, I don't remember anymore.
What kind of stage I did at that time,
how I got home that day...

How I threw away the agency,
my entire place of belonging,
and drifted to that city.

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
Wow—!
Look, look, fireworks!
They're so beautiful!

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
Apparently, they go off somewhere in the city almost every day.
The whole city is sparkling,
I'm really glad we came to Tesfinito!

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
Hotels, casinos, show stages...
The whole city is like a festival all the time!
...Oops, we should get going soon.

name: Tourist's Voice
text:
I'm looking forward to the magic show!
He's the guy you see online all the time, right?
Wow, I'm getting excited!

Beyond his downcast gaze, on the ground that changes to flashy colors,
a black shadow casts itself, scattering noise around.
That noise is also quickly drowned out by the sound of fireworks.

name: Roudin
text:
...Tch, what a crappy city.
Everywhere is gaudily shining,
and everyone is spouting noise.

name: Roudin
text:
And... In this crappy city,
the only loser who doesn't get caught up
in the lights or the sounds is me... Haha.

The shadow disappears, and a flashy color paints the ground again.
He gets inexplicably angry at that color and kicks the ground.
The light, which was momentarily disturbed, sparkled as if nothing had happened.

I frequented the casino every day,
got drunk at the bar, and was thrown out by the guards.
Even though, this was the life I chose after running away.

No matter what I did, I was never satisfied,
and a sludge-like blackness always filled my chest.

Not at 'anyone specific', but at the
malice of the world, at someone's happiness.
I spat out that blackness.

name: Roudin
text:
They get their hopes up and praise you,
and then they get bored and forget about you.
...Ah, it's so stupid.

name: Roudin
text:
What magician!?
What hero!?
It's all, all, all so stupid!!

Chapter 6:
No Need for Carnival

'I'm going to destroy the world of heroes.
First, I'll destroy GCE, where heroes
are acting as advertisements themselves.'

'And next, 'LIVE@HERO',
and everything that turns heroes into
entertainment, I'll destroy it all.'

A threat posted on Anonymous,
which seemed like a prank.

To share this information with all
related parties, [Player] and the others
were hastily making calls.

options.text: The two of them contacted the organizers.
All that's left... is that person, I guess.

text:
Waiting for Barrel and the other
two to finish their calls, the group
connects a call to that person.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Thank you for your hard work, [Player]-sama.
You've contacted me, so could I assume that you are
gathering information on the current incident?

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
If so, we are currently investigating in cooperation
with the colony police and S&S Heroes,
so please give us a little more time...

options.text: I'd like to talk to you about that...

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
...It's urgent, I see.
Can you tell me the details?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I'm connected to Nessen
from our agency.
Now, about the information I want to share...

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
...I've grasped the situation.
About this attack, Anonymous has
claimed responsibility for it, you say.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Both organizers are aware of the
'members' of Fortina Pavilion.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
We would like to thank the
people of Fortina for their cooperation
in the background check.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Yes. Therefore, we do not believe that
the people of Fortina are responsible
for this attack.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Then, the question now becomes
who did it, and why...!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'm sharing the threat information
with the local police and UEHA,
since it's villain-related~.

As he says, Barrel checks the
information sent to his device, and
continues talking to the group.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Right now, the Cyber... something room?
The super smart people are
investigating the post, but—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
They've said that it's
difficult to immediately pinpoint
where this post was made...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
And, I've had the people
who found this post continue
to monitor Anonymous, but—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
After that, similar posts have been made
multiple times, by multiple people.

options.text: What about a lone culprit's copycat?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I thought of that too.
But, they're talking about destroying an event of this scale.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text: I wouldn't say it's a large group, but I think they've planned this with a decent number of people, you know?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Having received this information,
we at S&S Heroes have decided
after internal discussion—

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
This event, will now
switch to be responding to
an 'emergency' situation.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
As soon as we have the consent of our co-host,
the Archimedes Colony, we will implement emergency measures
against villains in accordance with the manual.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
This is limited to matters related to this
incident. From my father who is absent,
I have received proxy authorization.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Therefore, as the representative proxy
of the Archimedes Colony, I will give my
consent to the proposal.

At Flamier's words,
Nessen nods with a smile
and continues talking.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
...Well then, I will explain the
specific measures we will
take from now onwards.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
In addition, the disclosure of this information
is limited to the representatives of each pavilion,
the police, and their affiliated heroes.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
First, we will officially announce that
there was a problem with the Ether supply
cable within the event, and—

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
We will close each pavilion, leaving some
sections open. This is to narrow down
the area that the heroes will patrol.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I see...
Considering the number of heroes stationed,
that's a logical decision~.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Thank you very much, Barrel-sama.
At the same time, we are making an emergency
dispatch request to the hero agencies on Earth.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Many heroes were staying on Earth for
the Summer Festa, so we were able to
get a considerable number of them to cooperate.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
The Global Drivers Union, which is
based in the Archimedes Colony, has also
promised to dispatch heroes.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Considering the arrival of the heroes and their
deployment to each pavilion, the time required...
Will be about 3 hours, I suppose?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
As expected of your insight, Flamier-sama.
As soon as the deployment is complete, we will disclose
the information to the guests and begin the evacuation.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I get the flow~!
Ah, if they attack while disguised
as closing staff, it'll be bad, so—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'd like the closing staff
to be accompanied by nearby
security staff~!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Thank you for your consideration, Barrel-sama.
Well then, let us get to work.
Please share any updates as they come.

The call ends with Nessen's words.
Following, a heavy silence
falls over the group.

name: Turbak
text:
It was supposed to be a special event,
but it's turned into a terrible situation.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...Yeah~.
Today's exhibition match is cancelled,
and even if the event restarts after all this...

As the group continues their gloomy
conversation, the people who had
finished searching Anonymous call out.

name: Viscunam
text:
I've finished most of the investigation on Anonymous...
What's with those faces, all of you?
Hmm— I suppose it's to be expected.

name: Viscunam
text:
Regarding this attack, rumors have
already started circulating online
that Fortina is the mastermind.

name: Sensettia
text:
If there's an official announcement about a
villain attack in this situation, it's all
going to be blamed on Fortina...

name: Viscunam
text:
Even if this is all settled and
the event resumes, this pavilion will be
downsized in the best scenario...

name: Theoreol
text:
After that, the pavilion itself will probably be closeD.
People outside the pavilion probably wouldn't be able to
tell the difference between the attackers and the Nethers.

name: Sensettia
text:
Well, it can't be helped.
It was going so well, and
it was pretty fun, though.

name: Viscunam
text:
Don't make that face, young lady.
Sentimentality about the past can
become noise for new creations.

name: Viscunam
text:
Well, this kind of trouble
is business as usual, isn't it?
I just need to leave my mark in my next plan!!

name: Sensettia
text:
You're right!
Well then, I'll be going, since there's gotta be
a meeting with the Nethers about withdrawing.

name: Theoreol
text:
As soon as the withdrawal is complete,
I'll return to my journEY.
This experience here was very interestiNG!

options.text: You're so quick to give up...

name: Theoreol
text:
To people outside the pavilion,
we're all seen as villainS.
This situation is only natural, isn't iT?

name: Sensettia
text:
Well, when you're a villain,
this kind of thing happens a lot.
We can't afford to be depressed every time!

name: Viscunam
text:
I've already chosen my own path,
knowing full well what to expect.
It's a waste of time to stand still!

name: Sensettia
text:
Hey, why don't you hide
that fact a little better!
You're just attracting trouble!

name: Viscunam
text:
Adada!!
I-I told you the beard is off-limits!?
Hmph, let's just get out of here!!

The members of Fortina Pavilion
act as if their situation hasn't changed.
At that, Barrel's face sinks.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...Are you three okay with this~?
I mean, the situation is
really bad~, but...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Once everything is settled!
We can advertise again,
and get a ton of guests...!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
You all and the Nethers
are really working hard~!
You just want people to enjoy the festival!!

name: Sensettia
text:
...Thanks, Barrel.
It's not that I'm completely
convinced either, but...

name: Theoreol
text:
We don't have the information,
or the means to break the situatiON.
Can't we just accept that it can't be helpeD?

Whether he understood what he was told,
Barrel's face sinks even further,
and silence dominates the scene.

name: Turbak
text:
...It can't be helped, huh?
No matter how much you wish,
no matter how hard you work.

name: Turbak
text:
There are things you just
can't do on your own.
...No matter how frustrating it is.

name: Turbak
text:
For this event to end happily,
someone else just has to endure.
...It's really, really painful.

options.text: Is that really the only way?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I get it...
If you think about the safety of the guests,
the event side's response is correct~.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
And if you think about the future,
it's also correct for everyone here
to withdraw~.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
This is the situation~.
Everyone is doing their best~.
...So, I guess it can't be helped.

At Barrel's quietly spoken words,
Roudin, who had been quietly watching
the group's exchange, opens his mouth.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...It can't be helped, huh?
There are plenty of things you
can't do on your own in life.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
So, you resent the world you can't do anything about,
resent yourself for not being able to do anything,
and look down. Just look down and let your feelings pass.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...That's important too.
If you endure and let it pass,
time will solve most things.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It's the same this time, right?
Even if we do nothing, in 3 hours, the heroes will gather!
They'll suppress the villains, and the incident will be resolved!

name: Viscunam
text:
...Hmph.
That's the expected outcome.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...And, after that.
Fortina Pavilion will be closed, and its
registration for GCE will be cancelled.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
But, well, if you think about the interrogation
and other troublesome things that come after,
it's smarter to retreat quickly, right?

name: Sensettia
text:
...That's true, but.
When you put it into words,
it's kind of irritating.

name: Theoreol
text:
I think it's a rational decisiON.
In fact, we're already preparing
to withdrAW.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...My bad,
my words were too harsh.
But, wouldn't you think of it this way?

As Roudin says, he smiles,
and like standing on a stage,
he continues to speak confidently.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
We still have 3 hours left!
If nothing changes even if we do nothing,
why don't we try doing something?

name: Sensettia
text:
...Huh!?
Sorry, I don't really get
what you're saying.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Protect the safety of the guests,
suppress the attackers.
And, continue the event!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
We have so many people gathered here.
Surely a magical idea
might just come to us, right?

options.text: It's too early to give up!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
[Player]-san,
and Roudin-san, too.
Thanks~, I—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I get it now~.
As a hero, and as a police officer.
I know I can't just act on my own.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...But, I can't~.
My— No, 'my' heart is
screaming out to me~!

you know how Barrel refers to himself as 本官 (honkan / officer),
and that I changed all of that into 'I'?
this is another case of 本官 -> オレ (ore / I (informal))

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
It's asking me if I'm okay
with this, and if I can smile
at this and call it 'cool'~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Everyone is right!
So, I want to make this an event where
everyone can smile and have fun~!!

name: Turbak
text:
...My heart, huh?
Yeah, that's right.

At Barrel's words,
Turbak quietly repeats them to himself.

The feelings that surfaced in his heart.
Savoring those feelings,
he continues to speak quietly.

name: Turbak
text:
...I, don't exactly like it either.
I'm sure it's an unnecessary thing to do,
and it'll probably just stir up the situation.

name: Turbak
text:
But... But still, I want
everyone to be happy.

name: Turbak
text:
I want to share the memories
of this event, one of the
best memories ever, with everyone!

name: Viscunam
text:
...You people, do you even realize
what you're saying?
You'll be seen as one of them if you do?

name: Sensettia
text:
I'm happy you've said that,
but if you were to be suspected
because you've worked hard for us...

At the group's words,
Viscunam and the others are surprised,
and Barrel smiles broadly.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, that's not it~, everyone!
It's true that it's for your sake~,
but there's more to it than that—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I want to do something~.
Otherwise, I can't smile from the bottom of my heart,
I can't puff out my chest and say 'I'm cool'~!

options.text: I don't want to give up until the end.
If it's come to this, let's go all out!
We have to end the event with a smile!

name: Theoreol
text:
Without any concrete measures,
you're going to overturn the
current situatiON?

name: Theoreol
text:
Very—very interestiNG!
I'll cooperate too, I have to
see this through to the enD!

name: Sensettia
text:
If that's what you're going to do,
I'll help you out too.
Simply running away isn't my style!

name: Viscunam
text:
Hmm, the hero who saved a large-scale
event, that's not a bad achievement.
It might be worth taking a slight risk...

name: Viscunam
text:
Gwahahaha!
Very well, I'll lend you a hand.
This kind of thing is a piece of cake for me!!

As smiles return to the group,
Roudin himself smiles
and cuts to the chase.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Haha, it seems our policy is decided.
...Well, from here on out, it's about
what to do specifically—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I'm the one who instigated this,
so I've got a little idea, yes?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Ooh, as expected of Roudin-san~!
I'll help with anything, so let's hear
the big announcement~!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Ah... It's really just a little
idea I had, so don't raise
your expectations too high, okay—

Roudin prefaces his words,
and in order to overturn this situation,
he continues.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
First, why don't we reassess our goals?
Capture the attackers,
ensure no casualties, and—

name: Theoreol
text:
Before the information that Fortina
Pavilion is the mastermind spreads,
resume the event, righT?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Right.
Ah... It sounds overwhelming when you say it,
but that is the final goal.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
So, what should we do?
It's very simple, the remaining 3
hours until the official announcement—

name: Turbak
text:
By that time, we'll have captured the attackers,
and pretend the attack never happened.
...Is that what you mean?

options.text: We don't know the number or location of the enemy, right?
What on earth do we do...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
We don't know the number or location of the enemy,
so we'll just have to gather them.
This is where my idea comes in...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Viscunam, Sensettia, Theoreol.
I want you to spread information
on Anonymous.

name: Viscunam
text:
Oh?
It seems you have a plan up
your sleeves, so let's hear it.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The threat was real, and a large
number of hero reinforcements are coming.
Spread that message far and wide.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
If you add that it's reliable
information from the Fortina staff,
it'll spread in an instant.

name: Sensettia
text:
I don't mind spreading
the information, but can
you at least tell me why?

At Sensettia's question,
Roudin nods lightly and
continues his explanation.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Delaying slightly from the information
on Anonymous, the organizers will send
out an announcement for a 'special stage'.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The announcement of the partial
pavilion closure will start soon, right?
So, in line with that—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
To provide some enjoyment to our
inconvenienced guests, we've
decided to hold a special event.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
A special, one-time-only live show~!
If that's the case, the guests will be
thrilled to come~!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Right?
If we do this, the people in the venue and
the attackers will all come to the stage—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Or rather,
they'll have no choice
but to come, yes?

options.text: Will it really be that simple?

name: Theoreol
text:
I see, with the pavilion closures and the
highly effective event, you'll gather the
attackers to the stage with the guestS.

name: Sensettia
text:
Will it really be that simple?
If they're going to hide, wouldn't a pavilion
with fewer people be better...?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
No, they will have no choice but to come.
They simply have one goal,
that is to 'destroy this event'.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
They can't destroy the event
just by wrecking a few
empty pavilions.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
If they're serious about destroying the event,
they have no choice but to do it
where there are a lot of people.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
And on top of that, information about
pavilion closures, hero reinforcements,
and the special stage will spread.

name: Viscunam
text:
Hmm, it's true that people will gather at the
stage, but what about the possibility
that the attackers will just run away?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
They won't.
Judging from the Anonymous post and
the scale of the attack, they're probably—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Not an organization themselves.
Just like the Nethers here, a group of
individuals who gathered on Anonymous.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
The moment they seriously fight
the heroes who will be deployed later,
they'll be strategically finished.

name: Viscunam
text:
So, for the attackers,
the special stage
will be their last chance.

options.text: It's true that people will gather, but...
How will you find the attackers?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Ah... That's the part.
I'm stuck on the most important part.
It's true that we can gather people, but...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
How do we distinguish between
the guests and the attackers?

name: Sensettia
text:
The attackers are claiming to be
Fortina staff, right? In that case,
why not check their passes?

name: Sensettia
text:
We know the members who are
here now, so if we look for
anyone else with a pass...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Ooh, that's right~!
Then, let's mobilize all the local police~!!
We'll body check every guest...

name: Theoreol
text:
Barrel, that body check you're talking about,
are you sure you'll be able to finish
it in time after the guests have gatherED?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Guh!?
W-Well, with spirit, and
brute force, or something...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It might be tough after they've gathered,
but if we monitor a specific location...
How about narrowing it down to one entrance gate?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
That might work~!
They're doing body checks at the entrance
gate anyway, so I think they'll cooperate~!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Theoreol
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In theory, it is possible to check, but I will ask you the same question as befoRE.
Are you sure you will be able to complete it in tiME?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-Hmm...
You're right, I don't know if we'll have enough time...

options.text: If we check them one by one...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-Hmm...
You're right, I don't know if we'll have enough time...

name: Viscunam
text:
It's not just a matter of time.
What if they discard their staff IDs
and sneak in as guests?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Gr, grrrr...!
So it's no good either...
I thought it just might work out~.

Unable to decide on a definitive idea,
the group gradually falls silent.
At that moment, Turbak's voice calls out.

name: Turbak
text:
...Hey, everyone.
With my Parallel Weapon,
I might be able to do something.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Eh, seriously~!?
Turbak-san, tell us more~!
Details, please~!!

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, yes.
Um, my Parallel Weapon, is something
that 'connects' and 'shares'.

name: Turbak
text:
If I can connect with the people who touch
this thread, I can share their emotions,
at least enough to tell if they have strong malice.

name: Turbak
text:
I can't cover that wide of an area,
but as you said earlier,
one entrance gate should be fine!

options.text: As long as it's not a burden for you, Turbak-san...

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Isn't that just perfect!?
...I'm sorry to put the burden on you,
but can I count on you, Turbak?

name: Turbak
text:
Leave it to me!
If I can help everyone with
my power, I'll do my best!

Turbak nods powerfully.
Roudin smiles back at his words
and takes out his device.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Well, the policy is decided.
All that's left is to put the
event in motion.

And as he operates his device,
the call connects and the
other party is displayed.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Roudin-sama?
Is there some kind of trouble?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
To contact us directly, instead of
through the agency share...
Is there a reason for that?

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...Yeah, I'm about to make an
outrageous request to you two.
Please hear me out first.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
I see...
I've grasped the situation.
And what you all want to do.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Certainly, if that plan succeeds,
we can officially announce that the cable facility
has been restored and resume the event.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
I think it's a wonderful idea.
...But, on top of that,
there is something that I must say.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
What you are all trying to do is to spread
information before a complete system is in place,
which could potentially increase the risk.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Didn't you consider that the attackers,
with their backs against the wall,
might randomly attack the guests?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
That's...
It's true, but...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
But still, I don't want to give up~!
I want this to be an event where
'all the festivals' were super cool~!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
I do understand the risks.
No matter how unreasonable we are, all that will
change is whether one pavilion remains or not.

options.text: But still, I don't want to give up.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
...From the standpoint of S&S Heroes,
I appreciate your consideration
for our position, Nessen-sama.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
.........
...After all,
someone had to say it.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
As the proxy for the one
entrusted with the Archimedes Colony,
it is in best interest, that I reject it.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
But still, I believe in all of you.
I want all the pavilions participating
in GCE to be enjoyable.

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
That feeling is not just mine—
No, but probably shared by all
the participants.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
...Thank you very much, Flamier-sama.
And everyone, I would like to deeply
apologize for my rude remarks earlier.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
N-Not at all, Nessen-san!
It was something that someone
definitely had to say~!!

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
Fufu, well then, let's end the reflection here.
We have to move on to concrete actions,
but about Nessen-sama's story earlier—

name: Flamier (Ghostwoods)
text:
How about having the heroes from each
pavilion guide the guests to the stage
as part of fan service?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
That's a wonderful proposal!
While ensuring the safety of the guests,
we can definitely gather them at the stage.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Roudin-sama, should you need any other help,
please do not hesitate to ask.
I am just as unwilling to give up as you.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
That'll be some big help!
In that case, after the guiding session is over,
I want you all to be on standby at the stage.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
After all, having closed all the pavilions down―
We have to put on a show that
would surpass all of them!

The call ends with the smiles
of Flamier and Nessen, and
Roudin turns back to the group.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Well, it's settled!
From here on out, it's a
race against time, alright?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Yeehaaw!!
My spirit is at MAX, so time to go all out~!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Hey, hey, Barrel!
Don't just run off, we have to
guide Japan Pavilion first!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe!
I just, can't stay still,
I'm so restless~!!

Roudin and Barrel walk off, talking cheerfully.
Turbak watches them go
with a serious expression.

name: Turbak
text:
...I, have to make this a success.
It's okay, I can do it.
Because, I'm a 'good boy'.

name: Turbak
text:
Whoa!?
Ah yes, sorry, [Player]-kun.
I showed you something strange.

name: Turbak
text:
It's a little good luck charm of mine.
When the time calls for it, I tell
myself that 'It's okay, I can do it'!

name: Turbak
text:
This time, I have been entrusted to an important role.
So please leave it to me,
and I'll definitely make it a success!

As he says, Turbak leaves
[Player] with a smile and
follows after the two.

And so, the group races against
the little time they have, and hurriedly
proceeds with their actions.

And just as planned, the information spread,
and almost all the people participating in GCE
had gathered at the special stage.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Haha, this is quite a sight.
It might be the first time in a while
I've been on such a big stage.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When I was a kid.
Back when I just debuted, I was praised as a genius, and I got to perform on big stages.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When I was a kid.
Back when I just debuted, I was praised as a genius, and I got to perform on big stages.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course I am!
But still, to be a magician, means that I'll have to stand up and smile.

text:
On the stage's wings, Roudin was
smiling with his usual aloofness.
His smile fades, and he speaks quietly.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Ah... Everything I'm about to say,
please keep it just between us two.
Personally, I get how the attackers feel.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
A post that's a scribble of emotions,
to be dismissed as a prank
that no one pays attention to.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
So, you hate everything, and you want to destroy everything.
...But, you don't know what it is that you want to do.
So, you act without a plan.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
You're just looking for a place to scream out loud.
'I'm here, so take a good look at me.' In the end...
It does not matter what happens to the world, or yourself.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...I'm not going to forgive them.
But, I know what it is like to be in pain,
to suffer, to look down like a total loser.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
That's why I want to tell them.
That just a small trigger, can make
you look up and change your life!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
...Oops, I talked too much.
It seems the preparations are complete?

Roudin laughs as he says that,
and in his line of sight, two people
are waving at him.

name: Turbak
text:
It went well!
I think I was able to identify the people
with clear hostility towards this event!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Those people are in a few different places,
guided to seats a little away
from the other guests~!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Isn't that perfect!?
...Now, let us go, for the
special stage is starting!!

With Roudin's signal, the lights go out,
and the venue is momentarily enveloped in darkness.
And a light shines on the stage—

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
To all our guests at GCE!
Welcome to the special stage!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
We would like to apologize for
the inconvenience that may have
occured to you at the pavilions.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It'll be a little longer until they're restored,
so until then, the heroes of GCE
will put on a special show!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Before the heroes arrive,
shall we have a little
event to ourselves?

With Roudin's speech,
dazzling spotlights shine on several spots in the venue,
and the venue's lights turn on at the same time.

name: Villain
text:
Wha-!?
How!?

name: Villain
text:
...Damn it!
They've known everything!!

name: Armed Villain
text:
Haha, I knew it was impossible.
...Well, whatever, let's at least
go out with a bang!!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It's the start of our 'Guest Participation' pre-show!
Now, please come up to the stage.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Let's make this a flashy stage,
enough to 'destroy the GCE'!!
Battle Start

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
The villainy ends here~!
Surrender quietly~!!

Barrel shouts triumphantly, having
defeated over 20 villains and operators
who had climbed onto the stage.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Settle down.
...You'll definitely have
a chance to start over.

And, to the attackers who
had transformed back and collapsed,
Roudin quietly calls out.

name: Mercenary
text:
Shut up...
We're your enemies.
Don't talk to us so casually.

name: Mercenary
text:
I won't accept it... I'll never accept it!
It's not over yet,
we can still fight our way through!!

name: Mercenary
text:
What hero!?
You're just putting your dreams on display,
and pandering to the public!!

name: Mafia
text:
Because you can transform, because you can fight.
You're told to risk your lives and fight Kaibutsu,
and all you get is people's laughter through a screen—

name: Mafia
text:
In a world where it's normal to
live for those kinds of people,
you'll never see me accept it!!

Still restrained by the heroes,
the attackers struggle with all their might
and let out hoarse screams.

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone, be careful!!
This emotion is...
They're not in a state to talk!

At Turbak's voice, the heroes
strengthen their guard and carefully
reach for their restraints.

name: Mercenary
text:
'Observer'!!
Observe us, observe us right now!!

name: Mercenary
text:
My original dream doesn't matter anymore...
All of us here only has
one dream to fulfill!!

As he shouts, the attacker looks at the 'Observer'
who had climbed onto the stage with them,
and demands observation.

name: Attacker's Operator
text:
...Yeah.
You're right, it's not over yet.

name: Attacker's Operator
text:
If it's all for nothing anyway,
let's at least struggle until the end!!

In front of [Player], paths open
up one after another around
the collapsed villains.

But, those paths were clearly distorted.
The individual dreams that people hold—

Ignoring them, the 'one dream' that the attacker mentioned.
The path of that ambiguously drawn dream.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
H-Hey!?
What the hell is going on!?

options.text: A dream form that's close, yet so far...

text:
The heroes keep their distance, wary,
and in front of them, a large number of paths
open up around the attackers.

And, manifested from those paths,
the Parallel Weapons stick together
and fuse in a distorted way.

No longer retaining its original form,
the black, sludge-like thing
covered the attackers like a suit...

name: Imposter Villain
text: GRRRR!!

It became 'a single mass of attackers'
and let out a voiceless roar.
